roleset.name: hard-working and focused
roleset.note: DILIGENCE-N, DILIGENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.

example.name: diligence-n
example.text: Ah-aw has greatly delighted us by her diligence in study and good conduct;

example.name: diligent-j
example.text: Consequently , residents and State and local officials have become more diligent in planning and preparing for the next big earthquake .
example.arg: residents and State and local officials
in planning and preparing for the next big earthquake
